<class name="MixtureMultivariateNormalDistribution" extends="MixtureMultivariateRealDistribution" startLine="27">
* Multivariate normal mixture distribution. * This class is mainly syntactic sugar. MixtureMultivariateRealDistribution $Id: MixtureMultivariateNormalDistribution.java 1459551 2013-03-21 22:17:44Z tn $ 3.2
* Creates a multivariate normal mixture distribution. weights Weights of each component. means Mean vector for each component. covariances Covariance matrix for each component.
* Creates a mixture model from a list of distributions and their * associated weights. components List of (weight, distribution) pairs from which to sample.
* Creates a mixture model from a list of distributions and their * associated weights. rng Random number generator. components Distributions from which to sample. NotPositiveException if any of the weights is negative. DimensionMismatchException if not all components have the same * number of variables.
weights Weights of each component. means Mean vector for each component. covariances Covariance matrix for each component. the list of components.
<method type="List<Pair>" name="createComponents" startLine="84" endLine="96"> <declaration type="List<Pair>" name="mvns" />
